document_data.name: ''Fanged Mask''
document_data.value3e: 8,302 [[gp]]<ref group="note">The market price was revised from 4,302 gp, after the adventure's release, to fit better with the economy of 3e.
document_data.mainbody: e wearer of a ''fanged mask'' was granted an ability to land devastating biting attacks in battle. The damage of the bite bore a ''+1 enchantment'' and could leave the bitee literally stunned for 6 seconds.
document_data.Description:
To a person not versed in [[Arcane magic|the Art]], this half-mask appeared to be nothing more than one of the fanciful masks{{Cite book/The Abduction
|23}} This particular type of mask though had a row of sharp [[feline]] teeth at the bottom.After the adventure's release, the item's description was adjusted with added lenses.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of a ''fanged mask'' was granted an ability to land devastating biting attacks in battle. The damage of the bite bore a ''+1 enchantment'' and could leave the bitee literally stunned for 6 seconds.
document_data.Creation: The creation of a ''fanged mask'' required knowledge of ''crafting wondrous items'' and a spell of ''[[spiritual weapon]]''.
